text: "All These Niggas" is the second single off of American rapper King Von's first studio album Welcome to O'Block. The song was released on August 5, 2020. The song also features American rapper Lil Durk. The song was able to make it to #77 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was also certified 5Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). A music video for the song was released. It was directed by JV Visuals. In the video, King Von is rapping in a white Rolls Royce in the middle of the Parkway Gardens complex in Chicago, also known as the O'Block. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: All These Niggas
